verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14643'>ٱ</tajweed>لْف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Alam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'aṣḥābil-fīl(i).
verses.translation: Видал ли ты, как поступил Господь с людьми слона

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَلَمْ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4397'>جْ</tajweed>عَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لٍ
وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَاب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لَ

تَرْمِيه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14644'>ِم ب</tajweed>ِحِجَارَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14645'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6445'>ن س</tajweed>ِجّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لٍ
verses.translation: Которые комками обожженной глины людей слона сразили

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14646'>فٍ م</tajweed>َّأْك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>لِۭ
verses.translation: Затем он превратил их в мертво поле Соломинок и стеблей с разъеденным нутром
